trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>类用于表示中的单个行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: 中的每一行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件具有指定的行类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the row types that are valid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了对有效的行类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Row type
Description
A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.
trans-unit.target: 空数据行显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件没有可显示的记录时。

trans-unit.source: The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
To determine the row type of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的行类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object also has a state associated with it.
The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是以下表中的值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: State value
Description
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象处于正常 （默认） 状态。

trans-unit.source: To determine the state of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control stores all its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件将存储中的所有数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问的各单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个单元格包含控件，你可以通过使用，从单元格检索控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>单元格的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法的单元格来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的字段值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>字段列或自动生成的字段列中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 要从其他字段列类型，其中的字段值绑定到控件中检索字段值，请首先从相应的单元格检索控件，然后访问控件的相应属性。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用数据绑定表达式中直接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>字段列，而无需将值绑定到控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，字段值将自动放入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控件。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的字段值，必须首先检索<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>控制从相应的单元格，然后使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve the value of a field from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检索从字段的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the header row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>表示标头行的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control is declared in the header template.
The index of the row in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 集合中行的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> enumeration values.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> enumeration values.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
Initial value
The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.
The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.
The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.
The source of the event.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将事件沿页面的 ASP.NET 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已被取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> 集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 对象的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows" /> 集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于数据行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> enumeration values.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property to determine the state of the row.
The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是以下表中的值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: State value
Description
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象处于正常 （默认） 状态。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于执行操作之前，确定行的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 对象的行类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> values.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>属性来确定的一种行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>对象所表示。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid row type values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了有效的行类型值。

trans-unit.source: Row type
Description
A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.
trans-unit.target: 空数据行显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件没有可显示的记录时。

trans-unit.source: The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于在执行操作之前确定某一行的类型。
